name: Music Clash: fnf pvp online
description:
What do you often do in your free time? Have you ever think about an FNF music battle online?
In this game, You and your friend can take part in a Funkin music battle online on your own mobile.
Just try your best to tap the arrow when they exact match. Feel the music and rock the beat. Dance with cg5 and Funkin rhythm!
Match perfect notes as well as you can to beat your opponents and get more cups to unlock next week.
There are full 7 weeks with over 5 mods like mid-fight masses, tricky, ugh, whitty, miku, hex, sky, b-side in this game.
Play online, Multiplayer pvp battle.
Always update new mods and new features!
Have fun! And enjoy your Funkin music battles!
